INVALID_SONG: Please, specify a valid song url to play.
SONG_NOT_FOUND: Song you have specified couldn't find on YouTube.
NOT_IN_VC: You have to be in a voice channel in order to use this command.
SONG_ADDED_TO_QUEUE: Song has been added to queue. $song
ERROR: Ooops! It looks like an unexpected error occured on our side while trying to play that song.
